mapper.sql: select S.id AS subcategory_id, C.id AS category_id, C.name AS category_name, C.image_path AS category_image_path, C.sequence AS category_sequence, C.video_on_demand_associated AS category_video_on_demand_associated, S.name AS subcategory_name, S.image_path AS subcategory_image_path, S.introduction AS subcategory_introduction from subcategories S INNER JOIN categories C ON C.id = S.category_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subcategories (id, category_id, name, image_path, introduction, sequence) VALUES (#{id}, #{categoryId}, #{name}, #{imagePath}, #{introduction}, #{sequence})
mapper.sql: SELECT V.id AS id, V.name_key AS name_key, V.name AS name, V.image_path AS image_path, V.url AS url, V.sequence AS sequence FROM video_on_demands V
mapper.select: INNER JOIN subcategory_video_on_demands S ON V.id = S.video_on_demand_id WHERE S.subcategory_id = #{subcategoryId} ORDER BY V.sequence
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subcategory_video_on_demands (id, subcategory_id, video_on_demand_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{subcategoryId}, #{videoOnDemandId})
